info.title: LDES Server Admin API
info.description: This API makes it possible to manage an LDES Server

put.summary: Update DCAT metadata for a view

requestBody.description: A blank node of type dcat:DataService with only dcat:DataService properties (e.g. dct:title) and relations (e.g. dct:license), excluding relations (non-configurable metadata) to dcat:Catalog and dcat:DataService

application/n-quads.example:
_:genid1 <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#DataService> .
_:genid1 <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> "My geo-spatial view"@en .
_:genid1 <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> "Geospatial fragmentation for my LDES"@en .

post.summary: Add DCAT metadata for a view

requestBody.description: A blank node of type dcat:DataService with only dcat:DataService properties (e.g. dct:title) and relations (e.g. dct:license), excluding relations (non-configurable metadata) to dcat:Catalog and dcat:DataService

application/n-quads.example:
_:genid1 <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#DataService> .
_:genid1 <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> "My geo-spatial view"@en .
_:genid1 <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> "Geospatial fragmentation for my LDES"@en .

delete.summary: Delete DCAT metadata for a view

get.summary: Retrieve the shape for a collection

404.description: No event stream with provided id could be found

put.summary: Adds a shape to a collection

400.description: The provided shacl shape is not valid

404.description: No event stream with provided id could be found

put.summary: Update the Event Source of an Event Stream

200.description: Event Source has been successfully updated

404.description: Event Stream with provided collection name could not be found

put.summary: Update DCAT metadata for a LDES

requestBody.description: The body must contain a blank node of type dcat:Dataset with only dcat:Dataset properties (e.g. dct:title) and relations (e.g. dct:creator), excluding relations (non-configurable metadata) to dcat:Catalog and dcat:DataService.

post.summary: Add DCAT metadata for a LDES

requestBody.description: The body must contain a blank node of type dcat:Dataset with only dcat:Dataset properties (e.g. dct:title) and relations (e.g. dct:creator), excluding relations (non-configurable metadata) to dcat:Catalog and dcat:DataService.

delete.summary: Delete DCAT metadata for a LDES

put.summary: Update DCAT configuration for the server

requestBody.description: A blank node of type dcat:Catalog with only dcat:Catalog properties (e.g. dct:title) and relations (e.g. dct:publisher), excluding relations (non-configurable metadata) to dcat:Dataset and dcat:DataService

404.description: No DCAT configuration found with provided id

400.description: Provided DCAT configuration is not valid

delete.summary: Delete DCAT configuration for the server

get.summary: Retrieve list of configured Event Streams

post.summary: Create an Event Stream based on the provided config

Version Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests version objects

State Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests state objects

State Objects ingestion with custom deli.description: An event stream that ingests state objects with a custom version delimiter

Version Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests version objects

State Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests state objects

State Objects ingestion with custom deli.description: An event stream that ingests state objects with a custom version delimiter

Version Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests version objects

State Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests state objects

State Objects ingestion with custom deli.description: An event stream that ingests state objects with a custom version delimiter

400.description: The provided config is not valid

Version Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests version objects

State Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests state objects

State Objects ingestion with custom deli.description: An event stream that ingests state objects with a custom version delimiter

Version Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests version objects

State Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests state objects

State Objects ingestion with custom deli.description: An event stream that ingests state objects with a custom version delimiter

Version Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests version objects

State Objects ingestion.description: An event stream that ingests state objects

State Objects ingestion with custom deli.description: An event stream that ingests state objects with a custom version delimiter

get.summary: Retrieve a list of configured views of a collection

requestBody.description: A valid RDF model defining a view for a collection

Time-Based Retention.description: A time-based retention policy which is configured to only keep members whose ldes:timestamppath is less than 2 minutes ago.

Version-Based Retention.description: A version-based retention policy which is configured to only keep members the two most recent versions of a resource.

Pagination View.description: A pagination fragmentation strategy which is configured to create new pages when a member limit of 100 members is reached.

Time-Based Fragmentation Strategy.description: A time-based fragmentation strategy which is configured to create new pages when a member limit of 100 members is reached.

Geospatial Fragmentation Strategy.description: A geospatial fragmentation strategy which is configured to partition the data on zoom level 15.

Reference Fragmentation Strategy.description: A reference fragmentation strategy which is configured to partition the data on the provided property path (fragmentationPath).

400.description: Duplicate View or Wrongly Configured View

404.description: Event Stream with provided collection name could not be found

200.description: Event Stream is successfully closed and all related fragments are made immutable

get.summary: The combined metadata for the server is retrieved

200.description: The combined DCAT of the server is returned

application/n-quads.example:
<http://localhost:8080/> <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Catalog> .
<http://localhost:8080/> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> "My LDES'es"@en .
<http://localhost:8080/> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> "All LDES'es from publiser X"@en .
<http://localhost:8080/> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/publisher> <http://sample.org/company/PublisherX> .
<http://localhost:8080/> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#dataset> <http://localhost:8080/event-stream> .
<http://localhost:8080/> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#service> <http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> .
<http://sample.org/company/PublisherX> <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent> .
<http://sample.org/company/PublisherX> <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/name> "Data Publishing Company" .
<http://sample.org/company/PublisherX> <http://www.w3.org/ns/legal#legalName> "Data Publishing Company BV" .
<http://sample.org/company/PublisherX> <http://data.europa.eu/m8g/registeredAddress> _:genid1 .
<http://sample.org/company/PublisherX> <http://data.europa.eu/m8g/contactPoint> _:genid2 .
_:genid1 <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/ns/locn#Address> .
_:genid1 <http://www.w3.org/ns/locn#fullAddress> "Some full address here" .
_:genid2 <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://data.europa.eu/m8g/ContactPoint> .
_:genid2 <http://data.europa.eu/m8g/hasEmail> "info@data-publishing-company.com" .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream> <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#Dataset> .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> "My LDES"@en .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> "LDES for my data collection"@en .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#DataService> .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#endpointURL> <http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page> .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#servesDataset> <http://localhost:8080/event-stream> .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/title> "My geo-spatial view"@en .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/description> "Geospatial fragmentation for my LDES"@en .
<http://localhost:8080/event-stream/by-page/description> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/license> _:genid3 .
_:genid3 <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://purl.org/dc/terms/LicenseDocument> .
_:genid3 <http://purl.org/dc/terms/type> _:genid4 .
_:genid4 <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#Concept> .
_:genid4 <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#prefLabel> "some public license"@en .

500.description: The validation report of the invalid dcat.

post.summary: Add DCAT configuration for the server

requestBody.description: A blank node of type dcat:Catalog with only dcat:Catalog properties (e.g. dct:title) and relations (e.g. dct:publisher), excluding relations (non-configurable metadata) to dcat:Dataset and dcat:DataService

400.description: Provided DCAT configuration is not valid

201.description: The generated UUID that is linked to the created DCAT

404.description: Event Stream with provided collection name could not be found

200.description: Event Stream has been successfully deleted

404.description: Event Stream with provided collection name could not be found
